item.title: Glossary Of Terms
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Term Type Brief Description AccountingContext Context – undefined – Accounts Type Accounts are used to move money between Improving.App and an organization, or between suborganizations defined within an organization. ActivateTenant Type – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active State – undefined – ActiveMemberHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveOrganization Handler – undefined – ActiveProductHandler Handler – undefined – ActivePromotionHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveState State – undefined – ActiveTenant State – undefined – ActiveTenantHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveVendorHandler Handler – undefined – AddLiveUpdate Type – undefined – AddMembersToOrganization Type – undefined – AddOwnersToOrganization Type – undefined – Address Type – undefined – Available State – undefined – AvailableProductHandler Handler – undefined – AvailableVenueHandler Handler – undefined – BillingAccount Entity – undefined – BillingAccountId Type – undefined – BillingContact Type – undefined – CAPostalCode Type – undefined – Calendars Context – undefined – CancelEvent Type – undefined – CancelReservation Type – undefined – Cancelled State – undefined – Cancelled Enumerator – undefined – Cancelled State – undefined – CancelledEventHandler Handler – undefined – CancelledOrderHandler Handler – undefined – Cart Entity – undefined – Catalog Entity – undefined – Catalog State – undefined – CatalogHandler Handler – undefined – CatalogId Type – undefined – Category Entity – undefined – Category State – undefined – CategoryHandler Handler – undefined – CategoryId Type – undefined – ChangeEventInfo Type – undefined – ChangeTenantName Type – undefined – Closed State – undefined – ClosedStoreHandler Handler – undefined – Commerce Context – undefined – Contact Type – undefined – ContactList Type There are three kinds of contacts: Primary Contacts, Billing Contacts, and Distribution Contacts.
